HEBREW: וּבְנֵ֣י קֵינִי֩ חֹתֵ֨ן מֹשֶׁ֜ה עָל֨וּ מֵעִ֤יר הַתְּמָרִים֙ אֶת־בְּנֵ֣י יְהוּדָ֔ה מִדְבַּ֣ר יְהוּדָ֔ה אֲשֶׁ֖ר בְּנֶ֣גֶב עֲרָ֑ד וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב אֶת־הָעָֽם׃
ENGLISH: And the children of the Qeni, Moshe’s father in law, went up out of the city of palm trees with the children of Yehuda into the wilderness of Yehuda, which lies in the south of ῾Arad; and they went and dwelt among the people.
